title: Internet of Things and the Cloud
headline: Internet of Things and the Cloud
description: This free online course on the internet of things and the cloud quickly teach you the most important details of the integration of cloud computing and the IoT. Both the Internet of Things and cloud computing are gradually transforming the way we complete our daily tasks, and although they are different from each other, they have a complementary relationship. This free online course is sure to give your computer programming career a solid boost.
courseDescription:
In this online course on the Internet of Things begins with an introduction of the IoT concept and opportunities associated with it. Along with guiding you through Raspberry Pi 3, its uses, different parts, and functions. You will view a demonstration how to configure a new Raspberry Pi 3 and install an operating system on it. From here, it shows you how to create a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) application, and will further show you how to debug such an application.

The course, will teach you about Azure and the Cloud, and their relationship with the IoT. You will learn the difference between inputs and outputs from an IoT system and obtain insights on the IoTâ€™s potential growth. You will learn how to build an IoT solution in Azure and be shown how to identify the four categories of devices and tell the difference between each of them.

By successfully completing this cloud computing course, you will be able to discuss the key concepts behind the IoT, and will be able to explain the relation of the cloud to the IoT. With the integration of the cloud and the IoT gaining strong momentum, this will be an excellent boost to your career. So, take the course now and get ahead with a strong understanding of this technology.
